item.title: Disney’s Mickey & Friends Launches Pop-Up at La La Land Kind Café, Featuring Themed Kids Menu and Pluto-Inspired Pup Cups
item.description: La La Land Kind Café has teamed up with Disney’s Mickey and Friends to launch its first-ever kids menu on Aug. 19 at all of its 23 locations including Los Angeles, Dallas-Fort Worth, Houston, Au
